ErrorCode.name: Statistics
ErrorCode.description: Statistics are provided for a logger

Member.name: LastPeriodDuration
Member.description: Duration of last period used for statistics calculation [seconds]

Member.name: LastPeriodNumberOfMessages
Member.description: Number of messages during last period used

Member.name: StatisticsGranularity
Member.description: Period of time defined for statistics calculation [seconds]

Member.name: MessageStatistics
Member.description: Mean number of messages logged per granularity period (MessageStatistics = LastPeriodNumberOfMessages * StatisticsGranularity / LastPeriodDuration)

Member.name: MessageIncrement
Member.description: Increment of messages with respect to previous calculation period [%]

Member.name: LastPeriodNumberOfErrorMessages
Member.description: Number of error messages during last period used

Member.name: ErrorMessageStatistics
Member.description: Mean number of messages logged per granularity period (MessageStatistics = LastPeriodNumberOfErrorMessages * StatisticsGranularity / LastPeriodDuration)

Member.name: ErrorMessageIncrement
Member.description: Increment of error messages with respect to previous calculation period [%]
